alert.note: Alert for Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 18 at 3:14PM EST until January 21 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM FRIDAY TO 4 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 9 to 14 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Northern Erie and Southern Erie counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM Friday to 4 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Widespread snow late tonight and Friday morning will transition to lake effect snow Friday afternoon which will persist through Saturday night. With the timing of snow, expect impacts to the Friday morning commute and possibly the evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission strongly encourage motorists to heed all travel restrictions and delay unnecessary travel. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
